it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.controller.cardCreator

Class CardsCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.controller.cardCreator.CardsCreator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardsFirstPeriod, CardsSecondPeriod, CardsThirdPeriod

    public abstract class CardsCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used to implement the State Pattern with this cards loader
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardsCreator

        public CardsCreator(java.lang.String folderPath)
             throws java.io.IOException
        The constructor of the cards creator
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The path to the folder which contains the correct cards to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if there is a Input/Output problem. Probably the path isn't correct

      • getNextCards

        private StaticList<Card> getNextCards(StaticList<Card> cards,
                                      int lowIndex,
                                      int highIndex)
        Private method used to get the next (highIndex - lowIndex) cards to give it to the Table
        Parameters:
        cards - The correct StaticList to copy
        lowIndex - The index of the first card to copy
        highIndex - The index of the last card to copy (not included)
        Returns:
        StaticList of 4 chosen cards

      • loadCard

        private StaticList<Card> loadCard(java.lang.String fileName)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Private method used to load the card Card file must be at most with 8 card
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the cards file in the directory specified in construction
        Returns:
        The StaticList of 8 cards
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a problem with the file. Maybe the name isn't correct or there are less card than 8 in the file

      • nextState

        public abstract CardsCreator nextState()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Method to implement in the inherited classes to go to the new state
        Returns:
        Return the new state
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a problem in the new state creation
